name: Last hero: Dawn of the Dead
name_original: Last hero: Dawn of the Dead
description:
Time to join the roguelike zombie shooting action game

Christmas is arriving! Come on and shoot against zombies, saving the world!
As the doomsday crisis erupted, zombies wandering everywhere, the government set up relief sites in different cities, calling for survivors to gather at fixed relief sites, fighting as heroes with guns, combating and shooting with zombies, seeking a safe area.
Last Hero is a roguelike gun-shooting action game that you can play as the superhero to conquer and defense various zombies, monsters, and enemies. Can you defeat the countless zombies and uncover the truth of the doomsday crisis? Could you finally become the last hero in this disaster? It's time to download the strategy shooting game: Last Hero now.

Gameplay Feature

▶ ONE-FIGNER OPERATION
Easy to get started, fluently and convenient gun-shooting, attacking, combating, moving and evading operation and gameplay.

▶ ROGUELIKE GAMEPLAY FEATURE
Numerous combo skills, different battle experience, multiple zombies challenges combat on each 
round.

▶ VARIOUS SHOOTING WEAPONS
4 distinctive guns with unique mechanics, choose and fight against the zombies!

▶ENDLESS GAME LEVEL
Thousands of zombies and bosses are waiting for you, along with diverse maps, providing rich battlefield and gameplay

▶VARIOUS HERO CHARACTER
Different hero along with various skills and powerful attack

If you like the Last Hero please take your time to give a positive rating and review to support us! Your encouragement could make the game even better!

Once you have any questions, please feel free to contact us anytime at:
